name: Mythical Myriad
description:
"Swing around from flat-planet to flat-planet as quick as possible while you attempt to collect all of the mythical objects to keep the humans from discovering them."

You play as an alien swinging around the multiverse of failed myths, cleaning up after the Rulers decide against including certain objects in the headcanon of our universe. You must use the flat earths and moons to swing yourself back and forth to find and collect the unwanted myths so that the humans don't stumble upon them one day.

---BTW the game may crash when saving your highscore for the first time. IF THIS HAPPENS, refreshing the page should fix this---

CONTROLS:

Left-click: extend arm/grab

Space: jump/boost

Join my discord server HERE to follow development updates and talk with me and others.

This was a solo project. All scripts, art, music, animations, UI, and ideas were made by me
